hero.title: Skip the Queue, Book Your Hospital Appointment Online
hero.subtitle: Access Ghana's public hospitals from anywhere. Book appointments at your convenience and receive timely reminders.

step1.title: Search & Select
step1.description: Find your preferred hospital and department from our network of public hospitals across Ghana.

step2.title: Choose Time
step2.description: View available time slots and pick the one that works best for your schedule.

step3.title: Confirm Booking
step3.description: Receive instant confirmation via SMS and email with your appointment details.

step4.title: Visit Hospital
step4.description: Show your booking reference at the hospital for quick check-in. No more long queues!

free.title: Free to Use
free.description: No booking fees. Only pay standard hospital consultation charges.

reminders.title: Smart Reminders
reminders.description: Get SMS and email reminders before your appointment so you never miss it.

multilingual.title: Multiple Languages
multilingual.description: Available in English, Twi, Ga, Ewe, and Hausa for your convenience.

support.title: 24/7 AI Support
support.description: Our AI assistant is always ready to help you find and book appointments.
